Posts.EditableText:
Hello, the game server is down.

We are trying to start up the new server that we were discussing these last weeks since the current one does not know how long it will take to be online again.
Posts.HTML:
Hello, the game server is down.

We are trying to start up the new server that we were discussing these last weeks since the current one does not know how long it will take to be online again.

Posts.EditableText:
The new server is now running.

We apologize for the problems and hope that everything works better now and the crashes we had before have disappeared.

Thank you all for your patience with this problem.
